then some percentage of the traffic are

those Canary pods are then analyzed by
the Numa flow pipelines uh which
generates an anomaly score um if the
anomaly score is low like what we see
here in the slide where it's three then
the roll out will continue but if the
anomaly is high like say above seven or
eight then Argo rollouts will stop the
deployment and and automatically revert
to the prior
revision this is an important aspect of
how we allow our developers to deploy
with confidence and without needing to
